div.div: jealousy spirit sores in the body’s yin region

entry.def: jealousy spirit sores in the body’s yin region

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with du jing chuang 妒精瘡 , jealousy spirit sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang fan 黃礬 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 24: 妒精瘡 , “Jealousy spirit sores”, writes: 妒精陰瘡 , “ Jealousy spirit sores in the body’s yin region ”.
